text:
Lisa Whelchel (born May 29, 1963) is an American actress, singer-songwriter, author and public speaker. She appeared as a Mouseketeer on "The New Mickey Mouse Club". She played Blair Warner in the television series "The Facts of Life". She was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Inspirational Performance for her contemporary Christian album "All Because of You".
In 2012, Whelchel participated as a contestant in CBS' reality series '. She tied for second place. She was voted fan favorite.
Whelchel was born in Littlefield, Texas.
